text.div:
Unresponsive

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    LA10112-3 Unresponsive or minimally conscious
    LA12184-0 Unable to express basic needs even with maximal prompting or assistance but is not comatose or unresponsive (for example, speech is nonsensical or unintelligible).
    LA18439-2 Responds only with reflex motor or autonomic effects or totally unresponsive, flaccid, and areflexic.
    LA19988-7 Completely limited - Unresponsive (does not flinch, grasp, moan, increase blood pressure, or heart rate) to painful stimuli due to diminished level of consciousness or sedation.
    LA9343-0 Unresponsive

concept.display: Unable to express basic needs even with maximal prompting or assistance but is not comatose or unresponsive (for example, speech is nonsensical or unintelligible).
Responds only with reflex motor or autonomic effects or totally unresponsive, flaccid, and areflexic.
Completely limited - Unresponsive (does not flinch, grasp, moan, increase blood pressure, or heart rate) to painful stimuli due to diminished level of consciousness or sedation.
